verses.text: Ha winhaj Dawid ix b'itan jun b'it tik t'a Jehová ayic ix colchajel winh t'a yol sk'ab' winhaj rey Saúl yet' t'a yol sk'ab' heb' ajk'ol t'a winh.
Mamin Jehová, ichato nhak'een aj t'ayin, ichato in cuartel aji, yujto in Kolumal ach.

Ach in Diosal, a t'ayach scot wip, a t'ayach tzin col in b'a, in Tanhwumal aji. In Kolumal ach, te ay a poder. Uuj max in yamchajlaj yuj heb' ayoch ajk'olal t'ayin. Ha ach ix in a col t'a mach snib'ej in sataneli.
Smojton wal a b'itaji. Ayic swalan in b'a t'ayach, t'a wal elanhchamel tzin a colancanel t'a yol sk'ab' heb' ajk'ol yajoch t'ayin.
Ha smay chamel ix oymaj t'a in patic. Manh jantacoc yaelal ix jawi t'a wib'anh yic tzin sateli.
Ha chamel, ichato toxo ix spixoch slasu t'ayin, ichato ix sb'o in yaalil yic tzin telwi.
Mamin Jehová, ix wal in b'a t'ayach ayic ayinek' t'a skal in somk'olal. Ach in Diosal, ix in k'an a colwal. Ha t'a a cajnub' ix ab' tas ix wala'. Ix k'och wav t'a a chiquin.
Ichato ix ek' jun niwan quixcab' te ov. Ix te ib'xi sb'achnub'al satcha’anh. Ix tzicub'tanhaj wal yuj yowal a k'ool ach in Diosal.
Ichato ix elta tab' t'a yol a nhi', haxo t'a yol a ti' ichato ix elta jun k'ak' te ov. Ichato ix elta tzipipoc tzak'ak' t'a yol a ti' chi'.
Ix a jac satcha’anh, ix ach emuli. Ayoch niwac k'ik'al asun t'a yalanh oc ayic ach emul chi'.
Ay ach k'e t'a yib'anh jun querubín, ix ach b'at jenhenhoc, ix ach b'at b'achachoc t'a yib'anh ik'.
k'ub'an ach el b'aj te k'ik'k 'inal. Ix a k'ub'ejel a b'ha t'a skal k'ik'al asun b'ud'jinaquel yuj ha ha'.
Ach in Diosal, yuj scopopial a tziquiquial ix scha sk'ak'al juntzanh tzak'ak' chi'.
Mamin Jehová, ek' achto t'a yib'anh smasanil, ix el av icha wal sk'anh k'u t'a satcha’anh. Ix cot sacb'at yet' tzak'ak'.
Ix ak'anb'at a jul-lab', haxo heb' ajk'ool ix saclemcanb'at heb' yuj. Ix a julanb'at jun k'ak' tzek' copnaj t'a skal heb', ix pechchaj heb' yuj.
Mamin Jehová, yuj schaanhil ix ach awaji yuj pax jun ik' te ov ix ak'elta, ix checlaj yich ha' mar. Yuj pax chi' ix checlaj yich yol yib'anhk’inal tik.
Ach in Diosal, masanto t'a satcha’anh ix ak'cot a colwal t'ayin, ichato ix in ik'k'eta t'a yol jun ha ha' te jul yich.
Ix in a colan t'a heb' ajk'ool te ay yip, malaj tzin och t'a heb', yelxo wal te tek'an heb' t'a wichanh.
Ix och b'ulnaj heb' t'ayin ayic ay in och t'a ilk'olal, a achxo Jehová ix ach och wed'oc.
Ix in ik'anelta b'aj lot'an, ix in ak'ancanoch b'aj lewan. Ix in a colo' yujto xajan in uuj.
Mamin Jehová, ix ak' spak t'ayin yujto tojol ix wutej in b'a. Ix ak' a wach'k'olal t'ayin, yujto malaj in mul,
yujto tzin k'anab'ajej a b'eyb'al. Ach in Diosal, max in k'ulejlaj chukal, malaj in gana swik'canel in b'a t'ayach.
Naannhej masanil a k'ayb'ub'al wuuj, malaj b'ak'uinh sb'at a lolonel satk'olal wuuj.
Wach'nhej in b'eyb'al t'a ichanh. Ix in ya'ilej in b'a yic max in b'at t'a chukal.
Yujnhejton chi' ix ak' spak t'ayin yujto tojol swutej in b'a, malaj pax in mul t'a ichanh ach Jehová.
Mamin, a heb' tzach k'anab'ajani, ol elk'och syal a lolonel t'a heb'. Ha heb' wach' spensar, wach' pax tzutej a pensar t'a heb'.
Wach' tzutej a b'ha t'a heb' wach' sb'eyb'al, palta tza ch'ox a jelanil a tenanek' spensar heb' ixtum anima.
Tza col heb' emnaquil, haxo heb' syik'chaanh sb'a, tzik'emta heb'.
Mamin Jehová, a achton tzak' sakil k'inal t'ayin. Ha achton tzik'canel k’ik’ k’inal t'ayin ach in Diosal.
Yuj a colwal ix in saclemejb'at heb' soldado, ix in k'axpajek' t'a yib'anh smuroal juntzanh chonhab'.
Ach Jehová in Diosal, yelxo wal te wach' a b'eyb'al. Ha a lolonel ix ak'cani, smoj ton wal malaj ko chab'k'olal t'ay. Tza colel masanil mach yipk'olal aj yuj.
Mamin Jehová, malaj junocxo Dios, a achnhej. ¿Tocwal ay junocxo colwajum icha ach tik?
Ach in Diosal, a ach tzak'nhej wip. Ha ach tzin a cuchb'ej t'a jun b'e te wach'.
Icha sb'ey junok nok' k'ultaquil chej, icha wal chi' tz'aj in b'ey uuj. D'a sattac witz yeq'ui, tek'tek' waj uuj.
Ha ach tzin a k'ayb'ej t'a owal, tzak'anpax wip yic tzin pacchitan junok jul-lab' nab'a bronce.
Mamin, a ach tzin a tanhwej, tzin a colani. Ha a wach' k'ab' tzin yamank'e linhan. Yujnhej a wach'k'olal ix in ik'chaanh.
Wach' ix utej in b'e a b'oani yic wach' max in el-laj nhernajoc.
Ix in pech heb' ayoch ajk'olal t'ayin, ix yamchaj heb' wuuj. Maj in ochlaj waan masanto ix cham heb' wuuj.
Chok' ix wutejcan heb' yic wach' manhxo ol k'e waan heb'. Ix telwi heb' t'a skal woc.
Ha achton tzak' wip yic swak'an owal. Ha heb' schichon sk'ol t'ayin, tzak' yak'em sb'a heb' t'ayin.
Ha ach tza pechel heb' ayoch ajk'olal t'ayin. Yuj chi' syal in satanel heb' malaj tzin och t'ay.
Sk'an colwal heb', palta malaj mach scolan heb'. Stewi heb' t'ayach Jehová, palta max ach tak'wilaj t'a heb'.
Chok' tz'aj heb' wuuj icha wal lum pokok tz'ik'chajk'e waan yuj ik'. Tzin tek'anem heb' icha wal stek'chajem lum sok'om t'a yoltac b'e.
Tzin a colel t'a yowal heb' ch'oc chonhab'il, tzin ak'ancanoch yajaliloc juntzanh niwac chonhab'. Ha heb' anima manh wojtacoclaj, a heb' tzin ak'an serwil.
Anhej syab'an wab'ixal heb', tzin sk'anab'ajan heb'. Ha heb' ch'oc chonhab'il chi', syak'och sb'a heb' t'a yol in k'ab'.
Tz'ib'xik'e heb' yuj xiwelal ayic tz'elta heb' t'a yol scuartel.
Mamin Jehová, pitzan ach. Ach in Kolumal, alchajocab' wach' lolonel t'ayach. Ach Dios in Kolumal, ik'jocab' chaanh a b'i.
Ha ach tzak' yojtaquejel heb' tzin ixtani to ayach och wed'oc. Tzik'ancot heb' ch'oc chonhab'il t'a yalanh in mandar.
Ha ach tzin a colel t'a yowal sk'ol heb' ayoch ajk'olal t'ayin, aton heb' schichon sk'ool t'ayin. Mamin, tzin a colanpax t'a heb' comonnhej smak'an anima.
Yuj chi' swal wach' lolonel t'ayach t'a skal juntzanh niwac chonhab', tzin b'itanpax a b'i.

Uuj wal, swak' ganar niwac owal a in rey in tik, a in sik'b'il in el uuj. D'a masanil tiempo tza ch'ox a wach'k'olal t'ayin, a in Dawid in tik yet' t'a heb' winhtilal icha ajnac alani, xchi winhaj Dawid t'a sb'it t'a Jehová.
